basics.label: RESEARCH SCIENTIST
basics.summary: Highly motivated Research Scientist possessing proficiency in numerous disciplines of the biotechnology and in-vitro diagnostic ( IVD ) industry. Self starter and knowledgeable analytical decision maker, and effective natural leader
